summary: Diff adds a Motoko backend actor with mod and library models plus authorization mixin, and a React/TanStack Router frontend with Explore, Mod Details, My Library (auth-gated), and About/Disclaimer pages. It also adds Internet Identity auth hooks/UI, a profile setup modal, lime-on-charcoal theme variables, and references to generated logo/hero assets. Some key backend and asset verification is limited due to truncation/omitted files.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend exposes query methods to list mods and fetch a mod by id/slug; exposes authenticated methods to add/remove/list a userâ€™s saved mods.
missing_requirements.reason: Frontend calls actor methods (getAllMods, getMod, getMyLibrary, addToLibrary, removeFromLibrary), but backend/main.mo is truncated before showing these method definitions, so their existence/signatures cannot be confirmed from the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: At least 8 sample mods exist with varied tags and descriptions seeded in the backend.
missing_requirements.reason: Only three seeded mods are visible in the truncated backend snippet; additional seed entries may exist beyond the truncation but are not evidenced in the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generated images exist in frontend/public/assets/generated (logo + hero) and are referenced directly by the frontend.
missing_requirements.reason: Frontend references the expected asset paths, but the actual image files under frontend/public/assets/generated are not shown in the diff summary (some files were omitted), so existence cannot be verified from the provided evidence.
evidence: File diff summary: Omitted files due to limits: added=6

hallucinated_features.description: User profile capture and persistence (ProfileSetupModal, UserProfile type, profile save/get endpoints) beyond mod catalog and library.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requirements focus on mod catalog browsing/details and a saved-mod library with Internet Identity; no requirement mentions collecting/storing a user display name or profile workflow.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin/access-control initialization via secret URL parameter (caffeineAdminToken) and authorization mixin integration.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request admin token flows or access control initialization from URL/session parameters; it only requires Internet Identity auth for per-user libraries and a single Motoko actor backend.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer attribution/link to caffeine.ai with UTM parameters.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest and unrelated to the specified app functionality/theme requirements.
